response.original_title: SUPER MEN: The inside story of the 2015 Carolina Panthers
response.overview: Through dozens of exclusive interviews with key players, coaches, fans, team officials, and others connected to the team, the inside story of the 2015 Panthers team will be told in a way that it never has before by reporters Scott Fowler and Th√©oden Janes and visual journalist Jeff Siner. That team began the season 14-0, won the NFC Championship in Charlotte, and then suffered a disappointing loss in the Super Bowl.
response.tagline: The inside story of the 2015 Carolina Panthers
response.title: SUPER MEN: The inside story of the 2015 Carolina Panthers
